sentence: The facility layout was confusing and difficult to navigate
Not enough quality control in housekeeping toiletries not replenished dirty towel left
No issues whatsoever just wish I could have had time to use the golf facilites
The lobby corridors are all fairly narrow with a lot of wainscoting and classic touches
Again because of the weather we did not get to take advantage of some of the amenities but liked being able to drive to various locations nearby
Parking the closest parking to the hotel lobby was Valet Parking at 25 day leaving other guests having to park further afield
There is an outdoor pool but too cold to swim however there is a heated spa and an indoor pool located in a fitness facility
The toiletries are cheap the activities advertised for family are practically non existent
The lobby is too loud the pool is crawling with kids and there is people everywhere else you had think you could go
I opened the ice bucket to get ice down the hall way and GUESS WHAT
The pool fitness center amenities and rooms are all fabulous

Pleasant surprise for me as an international traveler waited at the reception with a very helpful and kind Michael McCarthy who was fluent in German and helped me in getting some of my problems solved immediately and efficiently
We also gathered on the deck outside the lobby and around the firepit for drinks and conversation
Great facility lovely golf course new tennis courts club amenities are exceptional
Great gold course pool and amenities
The fitness center is enormous and really offers all of the bells and whistles lap pool good equipment and even classes
The facilities were very good well maintained and staffed
Good service amazing facilities
My wife also went to the spa got her hair cut short with Sylvia great experience and used the spa amenities prior after the hair cut which are nice

The way our package worked out we got one free buffet breakfast daily at Texas Spice really awesome buffet you got to do once no matter what we used the resort gym steam room daily super awesome legit used the pool hot tub often and enjoyed Bob ’s Steak Chop is great for celebrating a birthday or special occasions
